title: Cinnamon City: Falling for the Magical City of Marrakech
description: Lyrical and evocative, this is a travel book masquerading as the story of the authorâ€™s purchase of a very dilapidated property in Marrakech and her attempts to renovate it. Included is the family Christmas from hell in a house with few modern conveniences, and her love affair with all things Moroccan.
author: Miranda Innes
